revisions.*: Because "rvslots" was not specified, a legacy format has been used for the output. This format is deprecated, and in the future the new format will always be used.

== Notes == 
Virtue: Honesty

[[Sigil]]: Wisdom - +5% skill gain, and +25% experience gain for meta pets and meta talismans.

[[Control Point]]: Power - 5% increased damage to monsters. Account-wide.

* [[Alchemist]] x5

== [[:Category:Atlas|Places of Interest]] ==
*1. Teleporter to central Moonglow
*2. [[Sigil]] stand - Sigil of Wisdom - +5% skill gain, and +25% experience gain for meta pets and meta talismans. For use in [[Factions]].
*3. Teleporter to northwest Moonglow (Scribes)
*4. Teleporter to northeast Moonglow (Mage shop)
*5. Teleporter to eastern Moonglow (Telescope)
*6. Teleporter to southern Moonglow (old Council of Mages base)
*7. Animal Farm - Sheep
*8. Old Council of Mages base
*9. Zoo
*10. Moongate
*11. Graveyard
*12. Telescope
*13. [[Control Point]] of Power - 5% increased damage to monsters. Account-wide. For use in [[Factions]].
